p.italic: “…Um, I think being a Christian and having that faith and knowing that life is precious and um- of course for me after I got- after I knew my status then I stopped like, like having multiple partners because I knew, OK, one- my Christian faith wouldn’t allow it. Like it was wrong to, to go around or whatever…So, I stopped you know... having those Christian values in me made me I would say made me healthier…”
